mapper.sql: id, productName, type, defaultSalePrice, defaultPickupPrice, icon, intro, state
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_sale_product ( productName, type, defaultSalePrice, defaultPickupPrice, icon, intro, state ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{type}, #{defaultSalePrice}, #{defaultPickupPrice}, #{icon}, #{intro}, #{state} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_sale_product
productName = #{productName},
type = #{type},
defaultSalePrice = #{defaultSalePrice},
defaultPickupPrice = #{defaultPickupPrice},
icon = #{icon},
intro = #{intro},
state = #{state},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_sale_product
productName = #{map.productName},
type = #{map.type},
defaultSalePrice = #{map.defaultSalePrice},
defaultPickupPrice = #{map.defaultPickupPrice},
icon = #{map.icon},
intro = #{map.intro},
state = #{map.state},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_sale_product ( productName, type, defaultSalePrice, defaultPickupPrice, icon, intro, state ) VALUES ( #{map.productName}, #{map.type}, #{map.defaultSalePrice}, #{map.defaultPickupPrice}, #{map.icon}, #{map.intro}, #{map.state} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_sale_product
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND productName like CONCAT('%', #{productName} , '%')
AND type like CONCAT('%', #{type} , '%')
AND defaultSalePrice like CONCAT('%', #{defaultSalePrice} , '%')
AND defaultPickupPrice like CONCAT('%', #{defaultPickupPrice} , '%')
AND icon like CONCAT('%', #{icon} , '%')
AND intro like CONCAT('%', #{intro} , '%')
AND state like CONCAT('%', #{state} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
